title: The history of the life and death of Sr. Thomas More, Lord High Chancellor of England in King Henry the Eights time collected by J.H., Gent.
author: Hoddesdon, John, fl. 1650.
publisher: Printed for George Eversden, and Henry Eversden ...,
notes: Attributed to J. Hoddesdon. Cf. Wing.
Previously published as: Tho. Mori vita & exitus. 1652.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
